title: [CHAMPION CONCEPT-Fruca'Alz] you never seen this before, RIOT you will be please with me
body:
Champ Concept: Fruca 'Alz

Passive:Open Eyes-Drops random void ward in brush area that moves in the brush, turning invisble every 30 secs,then reappearing moving again(unique passive-will sometimes teleport to other bushes, 1 count, max 3), unique death, grants 30 kill gold, and sounds like baron, or dragon across screen.

Q My Heart is yours-

" Links a piece of her lifeline granting ally 10% maximum health and 5% maximum mana increase,
unique passive-when you and ally take damage, you will suffer the most, if ally dies you lose fatal hp (50% current health) but whenever you and ally kills a champion or gain assit, you and ally gain 25% current health recover, and temporary boosted shield"

W Freedom

Shoots 5 energy balls surrounding her, locking on enemy champions when they come near, does splash damage slowing down enemies(does reduce damage if hits multiple enemies twice((keyword--multiple no syndra copycat for you))

E Unity

Grants you and linked ally bonus attack speed by 50%((decreases to 45%, 40%, and finally 35% attack speed EACH RANK UP))
this ability is the most unique and unheard of all. grants high increase attack speed at low ranks, but decreases as you rank up.

R Bane of Choice

Passive You can leave it unactive and gain a perm 200 shield boosting you and your ally untill damage, recharges every 20 seconds with 200% increased mana and health regen when below 25% health

OR

you can active it after 1 sec delay to do 150+ 10%Ap/20%AD ratio of both you and your link ally shock wave that slows enemies down, and reduces there mana and health regen by 200% for 5 seconds

IF YOU AND YOUR ALLY KILL THE ENEMY CHAMPION

YOU GAIN back the passive buff for 15 seconds, BUT it still goes on cooldown

this cooldown is 120 seconds starting off, ending at 45 seconds with 45% cdr

THIS IS THE FIRST ADAM AND EVE CHAMPION TO ever be created, PLEASE UPVOTE

simple, rewarding, tactical, and most important

A SUPPORT CHAMPION LIKE WE NEVER SEEN BEFORE.

replies.body:
1. Stop thinking your own creation is special and better than that of others, it's not, it's just one champion concept of many.
2. Passive: Is this a sort of active or does it randomly activate? If it's random then i'd go ahead and say that it's wayyy too clunky. You don't want to ward completely random bushes, especially considering that some may already be warded. We can't see the cooldown either.
3. Q: So basically just another way to snowball harder? What is this ability supposed to do when you're not ahead? Kill yourself?
4. W: In what way does this synergize with this otherwise supporty kit though?
5. E: This is stupid. You shouldn't add toxic and unfun gameplay elements just because you consider for it to be unique. You really need to reconsider the concept of this ability entirely.
6. R: So the shield value stays the same throughout the game? What kind of use would this thing have lategame?
7. R: Reduces their mana and health regen by 200%? So you mean they lose health based on their health regen? AND the lose mana? First of all, the health regen thing should really be replaced with a DoT instead, because all this does is tell your opponents "don't build this". Second, affecting your opponents' mana is extraordinarily toxic to play against, this can by no means be in the game.
